alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Hickman; Lewis; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:02AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lewis, southeastern Dickson, northwestern Maury, western Williamson and eastern Hickman Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1202 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Hohenwald, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Hohenwald, Centerville, Thompson`s Station, Burns, Fairview, Gordonsburg, Kimmins, Bon Aqua, Primm Springs, Lyles, Natchez Trace At Highway 96, Santa Fe, Hampshire, Williamsport and Leipers Fork. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 176 and 184. Interstate 65 between mile markers 65 and 67. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
